resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76491</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76491</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-0984-40ae-293a-04ef323680a2#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Jusztinianosz, 547, San Vitale, Ravenna, mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">Justinianos, 547, San Vitale, Ravenna, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Justinianos, 547, San Vitale, Ravenna, Mosaik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Justinianos, 547, San Vitale, Ravenne, mosaïque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Justinianos, 547, San Vitale, Ravenna, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Justinianos, 547, San Vitale, Ravenna, mosaico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Justinianos, 547, SAN Vitale, Ραβένα, 
μωσαϊκό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Justinianos, 547, San Vitale, Ravena, mosaico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A San Vitale mozaikjainak szép példája a Justinianoszt ábrázoló mozaik, akit ugyanolyan dicsfény övez, mint Krisztust (Kozmokrátor).</string>
            <string language="en">The good examples of the mosaics of San Vitale is the mosaic illustrating Justinianos, who is surrended by the same glory as Christ (Cosmocrator)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Jusztinianosz,  Kozmokrátor,  ,  6. század,  San Vitale,  Ravenna,  </string>
            <string language="en">Justinianos, Cosmocrator, 6th centrury, San Vitale, Ravenna</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die guten Beispiele der Mosaiken von San Vitale 
ist das Mosaik, das Justinianos veranschaulicht, das surrended durch 
den gleichen Ruhm wie Christ (Cosmocrator) ist</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les bons exemples des mosaïques de San Vitale 
est la mosaïque illustrant Justinianos, qui est surrended par la 
même gloire que le Christ (Cosmocrator)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os exemplos bons dos mosaics de San Vitale são o
mosaic que ilustra Justinianos, que é surrended pelo mesmo glory que 
Christ (Cosmocrator)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I buoni esempi dei mosaici del San Vitale è il 
mosaico che illustra Justinianos, che è surrended dallo stesso glory 
di Christ (Cosmocrator)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα καλά παραδείγματα των μωσαϊκών του SAN Vitale
είναι το μωσαϊκό που επεξηγεί Justinianos, το οποίο είναι 
από την ίδια δόξα με Χριστό (Cosmocrator)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los buenos ejemplos de los mosaicos de San Vitale
son el mosaico que ilustra Justinianos, que es surrended por la misma 
gloria que Cristo (Cosmocrator)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Justinianos, Cosmocrator, 6. centrury, San Vitale, 
Ravenna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Justinianos, Cosmocrator, 6ème centrury, San Vitale, 
Ravenne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Justinianos, Cosmocrator, õ centrury, San Vitale, 
Ravenna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Justinianos, Cosmocrator, sesto centrury, San Vitale, 
Ravenna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Justinianos, Cosmocrator, 6ος centrury, SAN 
Vitale, Ραβένα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Justinianos, Cosmocrator, 6to centrury, San Vitale, 
Ravena</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76491</entry>
